Content.Text: TCU Server has been updated to 1.2.1.0
▸ Fixed the crashing caused by the previous update.
▸ Corrected Faction Mission reward behavior (including Bonus missions).
▸ Corrected Summit Practice mission reward behavior.
▸ Corrected rewards for missions: "Parlay" and "Local Noise".
▸ Corrected scoring for mission "Work The Body".
▸ Fixed erroring when buying a new car spec.
